channel.title: Development team - Project Forgotten PK
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2uiupuf.jpg[/img]
[center][size=13pt]Current Staff[/size] [b]Owners/Coders[/b] [i]Cole Tyler[/i]
[b]Admins[/b] [i]Andrew[/i] [i]0 HP W T F[/i]
[b]Mods[/b] [i]I L Y[/i]
We will be using the source - Final Devolution.
[b]What I need.[/b] 4 IN-Game mods. 1 Head of Staff. 3 Admins. 1 Assistant to coders. 5 Recruiters 5 Beta testers
Application.
[code]IRL Name - [u][/u] Part [u] [/u] ( Can either be Assistant Coder, Client developer, Forum mod, In game mod, Recruiters or Beta testers) Why should I choose you? [u][/u] Add my email xlxoxoxt@hotmail.com once you have post "I have added you" - [u][/u] Past experience -[/code][/center]
[size=7pt][i]Note: This is a 317 server, not 508.[/i][/size]

item.title: Development team - Project Forgotten PK
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

IRL Name - Marc
Part ( Can either be Assistant Coder, Client developer, Forum mod, In game mod, Recruiters or Beta testers)ill be forum mod and ingame mod and ill test
Why should I choose you? I work hard and am very active. I enforce rules and help people
Add my email xlxoxoxt@hotmail.com once you have post “I have added you” - ill add you if i get accepted
Past experience - i code servers for myself and have been admin and owners on many servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Development team - Project Forgotten PK
item.dc:creator: @i_duh_loot i duh loot
item.description:
@i_duh_loot wrote:

IRL Name - Jonathan
Part(Assistant Coder)
Why should I choose you? I like to code, i code both client’s and server’s, i currently code my server and i released 1, but my new is much better and a different kind.
Add my email xlxoxoxt@hotmail.com once you have post “I have added you” -
Past experience -I code. And i like to code.

Read full topic

item.title: Development team - Project Forgotten PK
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

IRL Name - Why do you need to know? =P
Part Whatever you want me to be. (I have little knowledge of coding clients.)
Why should I choose you? I have helped you on previous questions, and I tried to show you how to host using µTorrent.
Add my email xlxoxoxt@hotmail.com once you have post “I have added you” - I will add you when I get home.
Past experience - Completely redoing an Allstar source at the moment. Looking to be finished within the next few months.

Read full topic

item.title: Development team - Project Forgotten PK
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

IRL Name - Kasey
Part Assistant Coder / Forum Creator / Beta Tester
Why should I choose you? Im a expert forum creator, Im a decent beta tester, and Im a good coder.
How to contact you? My email is servercoder@yahoo.com im on it every day, so its easy to contact me when im not in school.
Past experience - Iv own my own server, and im planning to create another one soon. Im very nice, and would be willing to help make your server a better community for your players / members.

Read full topic
